params.name: frame
params.description: number for this key. Must be an integer value.

params.name: value
params.description: for this key. Can be a Float value

ParticleSystem.name: ParticleSystem
ParticleSystem.author: Gwennael Buchet (gwennael.buchet@capgemini.com)
ParticleSystem.description: A particle emitter for the cgSceneGraph Particle System

Node.name: Node
Node.description:
Base class for a Node in the Scene Graph.
Each node encapsulates its position, dimension, scale and rotation, ...

Math.name: Math
Math.description: Static class that encapsulates some useful methods.
Math.author: Gwennael Buchet (gwennael.buchet@capgemini.com)

Util.name: Util
Util.description: Global constants used by the framework

Scene.name: Scene
Scene.description:
Represent the scene of the application.
It encapsulates the scene graph itself and several methods to track mouse and touch events, ...

CGSGParticleEmitter.name: CGSGParticleEmitter
CGSGParticleEmitter.description: A particle emitter for the cgSceneGraph Particle System
CGSGParticleEmitter.author: Gwennael Buchet (gwennael.buchet@capgemini.com)

CGSGNodeSprite.name: CGSGNodeSprite
CGSGNodeSprite.description: A CGSGNodeSprite represent an animated sprite, with all animations in the image

params.name: urlImage
params.description: URL of the image. Can be null to be set later

CGSGNodeSprite.author: Gwennael Buchet (gwennael.buchet@capgemini.com)

CGSGButtonMode.name: CGSGButtonMode
CGSGButtonMode.description: List the modes for a button : NORMAL, OVER, DEACTIVATED.
CGSGButtonMode.author: Gwennael Buchet (gwennael.buchet@capgemini.com)
example: myTextNode.setWrapMode(CGSGWrapMode.WORD, true);

CGSGNodeButton.name: CGSGNodeButton
CGSGNodeButton.description: A CGSGNodeButton represent a basic square
CGSGNodeButton.author: Gwennael Buchet (gwennael.buchet@capgemini.com)

CGSGNodeCircle.name: CGSGNodeCircle
CGSGNodeCircle.description:
A CGSGNodeCircle represent a basic circle.
By default, the pickNodeMethod used to detect the node under the mice is CGSGPickNodeMethod.GHOST.
If you don't need precision on detection on your circles, just change the property to pickNodeMethod.REGION.
CGSGNodeCircle.author: Gwennael Buchet (gwennael.buchet@capgemini.com)

CGSGNodeEllipse.name: CGSGNodeEllipse
CGSGNodeEllipse.description:
A CGSGNodeEllipse represent a basic ellipse.
By default, the pickNodeMethod used to detect the node under the mice is CGSGPickNodeMethod.GHOST.
If you don't need precision on detection on your ellipses, just change the property to pickNodeMethod.REGION.
CGSGNodeEllipse.author: Gwennael Buchet (gwennael.buchet@capgemini.com)

CGSGNodeImage.name: CGSGNodeImage
CGSGNodeImage.description: A CGSGNodeImage represent an image node

params.name: sliceX
params.description: Position of the content of this node on the src image

params.name: sliceY
params.description: Position of the content of this node on the src image

params.name: sliceWidth
params.description: Dimension of the content of this node on the src image

params.name: sliceHeight
params.description: Dimension of the content of this node on the src image

params.name: urlImage
params.description: URL of the src image. Can be null tobe loaded later.

CGSGNodeImage.author: Gwennael Buchet (gwennael.buchet@capgemini.com)

CGSGPickNodeMethod.name: CGSGPickNodeMethod
CGSGPickNodeMethod.description: List the methods to check the pick on a node
CGSGPickNodeMethod.author: Gwennael Buchet (gwennael.buchet@capgemini.com)

CGSGNode.name: CGSGNode
CGSGNode.description:

Each node encapsulates its position, dimension, scale and rotation, ...

CGSGNodeSquare.name: CGSGNodeSquare
CGSGNodeSquare.description: A CGSGNodeSquare represent a basic square
CGSGNodeSquare.author: Gwennael Buchet (gwennael.buchet@capgemini.com)

CGSGWrapMode.name: CGSGWrapMode
CGSGWrapMode.description: List the methods to wrap the text. Used by {CGSGNodeText} Node.
CGSGWrapMode.author: Gwennael Buchet (gwennael.buchet@capgemini.com)
example: myTextNode.setWrapMode(CGSGWrapMode.WORD, true);

CGSGNodeText.name: CGSGNodeText
CGSGNodeText.description: A CGSGNodeText represent a basic circle
CGSGNodeText.author: Gwennael Buchet (gwennael.buchet@capgemini.com)

__GLOBAL_CONSTANTS__.name: __GLOBAL_CONSTANTS__
__GLOBAL_CONSTANTS__.description: Global constants used by the framework
__GLOBAL_CONSTANTS__.author: Gwennael Buchet (gwennael.buchet@capgemini.com)

classitems.description: The animated nodes
classitems.name: parentNode

classitems.description: A string representing the attribute to be animated (eg: "position.x", "rotation.angle", "fill", ...)
classitems.name: attribute

classitems.description:
list of the [frame, value] pairs for the animation
the index of the list begins at 0, not at the first key frame
classitems.name: listValues

classitems.description: Callback on animation start event
classitems.name: onAnimationStart

classitems.description: Callback on animation end event
classitems.name: onAnimationEnd

classitems.description: Add a new animation key frame to the timeline and sort the timeline by frame number
classitems.name: addKey

classitems.description: Remove the key at the specified frame
classitems.name: removeKey

classitems.description: Remove all keys and values
classitems.name: removeAll

classitems.description: Compute the number of steps between all keys, 2 by 2
classitems.name: _computeStepsValues

return.description: the number of keys in this timeline. Must be an integer value.

classitems.description: Sort the list of keys by frame number
classitems.name: sortByFrame

classitems.description: Compute all the values (steps) for the animation of this timeline
classitems.name: computeValues

params.name: fromFrame
params.description: first frame at which one the computing must start. Must be an integer value.

params.name: method
params.description:
interpolation method : "linear"
 for this timeline instance

classitems.description: Compute animated value for one frame between key ay index keyIndex and keyIndex+1
classitems.name: computeValue

return.description: Object with 2 properties : frame and value, or undefined if keyIndex < 0
the first key frame of this timeline
the last key frame of this timeline

classitems.description: Get the value for the frame number passed in parameter
classitems.name: getValue

params.name: frame
params.description: the frame bound with the returned value. Must be an integer value.

return.description:
the interpolated value of the attribute at the specified frame
If no key is defined, return undefined
If there is only one key, return it's value
If the frame is before the first key, return the first key value
If the frame is after the last key, return the last key value

classitems.description: Return the precomputed array of values for this timeline
classitems.name: exportValues

classitems.description:
Import new precomputed values for this timeline.
The number of values must match the number of frame defined by the keys of this timeline
classitems.name: importValues

classitems.description: A void* property to let the developer store whatever he needs (new properties, ...)
classitems.name: userdata

classitems.description: Initialize attributes of this particle
classitems.name: init

classitems.description:
update the particle position with an Euler integration
TODO : externalize the process to choose between RK4 and Euler integration
classitems.name: updatePosition

classitems.description: the region from where the particles are emitted
classitems.name: region

classitems.description: number max of particles out of the emitter on 1 frame
classitems.name: nbParticlesMax

classitems.description: angle range of emission. a particle is emitted in the this.direction vector + or - this.angle/2 angle.
classitems.name: angle

classitems.description: speed of a particle
classitems.name: speed

classitems.description: threshold to randomize and add to the speed of a particle
classitems.name: speedThreshold

classitems.description: Gravity Force added by default with the addForce method
classitems.name: gravity

classitems.description: Callback on end of update for 1 particle
classitems.name: onUpdateParticleEnd

classitems.description: Callback when reinit for 1 particle
classitems.name: onInitParticle

classitems.description: Callback when reinit all particles is done
classitems.name: onInitParticlesEnd

classitems.description: start the animation
classitems.name: start

classitems.description: stop the animation
classitems.name: stop

classitems.description: reset the animation
classitems.name: reset

classitems.description: create a new particle, and add it to the emitter
classitems.name: _createParticle

classitems.description: Add a force to the emitter
classitems.name: addForce

params.name: ttl
params.description: time to live of the force

classitems.description: Remove a previously added force
classitems.name: removeForce

classitems.description: list of emitters
classitems.name: emitters

classitems.description: list of attractors
classitems.name: attractors

classitems.description: list of repulsors
classitems.name: repulsors

classitems.description: Add a force to all emitters
classitems.name: addForce

classitems.description: Create a new emitter and return it
classitems.name: addEmitter

classitems.description: Remove the emitter passed in parameter
classitems.name: removeEmitter

classitems.description: override the CGSGNode 'pickNode' method to return null due to performance
classitems.name: pickNode

classitems.description: This function must be filled by the inherited classes.
classitems.name: render

params.name: width
params.description: width for the image to be modified

params.name: height
params.description: height for the image to be modified

classitems.description: This function must be filled by the inherited classes.
classitems.name: render

params.name: width
params.description: width for the image to be modified

params.name: height
params.description: height for the image to be modified

classitems.description: This function must be filled by the inherited classes.
classitems.name: render

params.name: width
params.description: width for the image to be modified

params.name: height
params.description: height for the image to be modified

classitems.description: array of animations
classitems.name: listAnimations

classitems.description: Current animated frame
classitems.name: _currentFrame

classitems.description: Whether the sprite is being animated or not
classitems.name: _isPlaying

classitems.description: Number of loops for the current animation. if -1 then it's an infinite loop.
classitems.name: _numberOfLoops

classitems.description: Current loop number
classitems.name: _currentLoop

classitems.description: URL of the image
classitems.name: _urlImage

classitems.description: The image object itself
classitems.name: _img

classitems.description: Handler function fired when the image is loaded
classitems.name: onLoadEnd

classitems.description: Handler function fired after an animation loop is ended
classitems.name: onAnimationEnd

classitems.description: Handler function fired before an animation loop start
classitems.name: onAnimationStart

classitems.description:
Fake canvas to pre-render the animated sprite (not used yet)
Still beta
classitems.name: _tmpCanvas

classitems.description: Used to call delegate method when the image is finally loaded
classitems.name: _createDelegate

classitems.description:
fired when the image is loaded.
Check the dimension of the image and fired the onLoadEnd event
classitems.name: _onImageLoaded

classitems.description: To be overrided when the image failed to load
classitems.name: _onImageError

classitems.description:
Check the true dimension of the image and fill the this.dimension property with it,
only if dimension is not already defined in the constructor
classitems.name: _checkDimension

classitems.description: Set the image for this animated sprite.
classitems.name: setImage

params.name: newImage
params.description: new Image object. Must be an already loaded one

classitems.description: Go to the next frame of the current animation
classitems.name: goToNextFrame

classitems.description: Go to the previous frame of the current animation
classitems.name: goToPreviousFrame

classitems.description: Go to the first frame of the current loop
classitems.name: goToFirstFrame

classitems.description: Go to the last frame of the current loop
classitems.name: goToLastFrame

classitems.description: Must be defined to allow the scene graph to render the image nodes
classitems.name: render

classitems.description: Return position x and y in the image for the slice of the animation and frame passed in parameter.
classitems.name: _getSlice

classitems.description: Add an animation for this sprite
classitems.name: addAnimation

params.name: frames
params.description: Number of frame for this animation

params.name: sliceX
params.description: slice position inside the image for this animation

params.name: sliceY
params.description: slice position inside the image for this animation

params.name: framesPerLine
params.description: Number of frames per line in the image

classitems.description: Start an animation
classitems.name: play

params.name: animationName
params.description: Name of the animation to start

params.name: loop
params.description: number of animation loop. Can be null or negative to set infinite loop

return.description: true if the animation exists; false otherwise

classitems.description: Stop the current animation and stay on the current frame
classitems.name: stop

classitems.description: return to the first frame of the first loop of the current animation
classitems.name: reset

return.description: a copy of this node

classitems.description: High colors for the button in 3 mode : normal, over, deactivated
classitems.name: _firstColors

classitems.description: Low color for the button in 3 mode : normal, over, deactivated
classitems.name: _lastColors

classitems.description: Shadow color for the button in 3 mode : normal, over, deactivated. Can be null.
classitems.name: _shadowColors

classitems.description: Radius for the round corner in 3 mode : normal, over, deactivated
classitems.name: _radiuses

classitems.description: Text for the button in 3 mode : normal, over, deactivated
classitems.name: _texts

classitems.description: Text size for the button in 3 mode : normal, over, deactivated
classitems.name: _textSizes

classitems.description: Color for the text in the 3 mode  : normal, over, deactivated
classitems.name: _textColors

classitems.description: Text Node encapsulating the text rendering
classitems.name: _textsNode

classitems.description: Distance between the picto and the text
classitems.name: _distancePictoText

classitems.description: Fake canvases to pre-render static display
classitems.name: _tmpCanvas

classitems.description: Padding applied to the left and right of the text
classitems.name: _horizontalPadding

classitems.description: Padding applied to the top and bottom of the text
classitems.name: _verticalPadding

classitems.description:
Computed dimensions of the button in the 3 modes.
Do not edit manually!
classitems.name: _dimensions

classitems.description: Current mode of the button
classitems.name: _currentMode

classitems.description: Change the position of the picto : CGSGPositionMode.LEFT, CGSGPositionMode.TOP, CGSGPositionMode.RIGHT, CGSGPositionMode.BOTTOM
classitems.name: setPictoPosition

classitems.description: Set the image for the picto

classitems.description: Set the URL for the picto

classitems.description: Return the slices in the image for the 3 modes

classitems.description: Set the slices in the image for the 3 modes
classitems.name: setSlices

classitems.description: Return the High color for the button

classitems.description: Set the values for the high color of the button
classitems.name: setFirstColor

classitems.description: Return the Low color for the button
classitems.name: getLastColor

classitems.description: Set the values for the low color of the button
classitems.name: setLastColor

classitems.description: Return the Shadow color for the button

classitems.description: Set the values for the shadow color of the button
classitems.name: setShadowColor

classitems.description: Return the Low color for the button

classitems.description: Set the values for the low color of the button

classitems.description: Return the text of the button

example: button.setText(["normal", "over", "deactivated"]);

classitems.description: Return the text of the button

example: button.setTextColor(["white", "green", "yellow"]);

classitems.name: setHorizontalPadding

classitems.description: Pre-render the button into a temp canvas to optimize the perfs

classitems.name: _initShape

return.description: a copy of this node

classitems.description: the selected effect to be applied
classitems.name: effect

classitems.description: URL of the image
classitems.name: _urlImage

classitems.description: the image object itself
classitems.name: _img

classitems.description: the region on the image to render
classitems.name: slice

classitems.description: Event Fired when the image is finally loaded
classitems.name: onLoadEnd

classitems.description: Event Fired when the image failed to load
classitems.name: onLoadError

classitems.description: Event Fired when the image loading is aborted
classitems.name: onLoadAbort

classitems.description: used to call delegate method when the image is finally loaded
classitems.name: _createDelegate

classitems.description:
fired when the image is loaded.
Check the dimension of the image and fired the onLoadEnd event
classitems.name: _onImageLoaded

classitems.description: To be overrided when the image failed to load
classitems.name: _onImageError

classitems.description: To be overrided when the image loading is aborted
classitems.name: _onImageAbort

classitems.description:
Check the true dimension of the image and fill the this.dimension property with it,
only if dimension is not already defined in the constructor
classitems.name: _checkDimension

classitems.description: Set the slice into the image
classitems.name: setSlice

params.name: updateDimension
params.description: If true, the dimension will be set with the dimension of the slice

params.name: newImage
params.description: new Image object. Must bea already loaded before

classitems.description: Set a new URL for the image of the node
classitems.name: setURL

classitems.description: Must be defined to allow the scene graph to render the image nodes
classitems.name: render

classitems.description:
Ghost rendering function.
Render here your custom nodes with a single color (cgsgGhostColor).
This will be used by the SceneGraph to know if the mouse cursor is over this nodes.
classitems.name: renderGhost

params.name: ghostContext
params.description: The context for the ghost rendering

classitems.description:
Increase/decrease current dimension with adding values. It is used when the user resize
the image with the handle boxes
classitems.name: resizeWith

return.description: a copy of this node

classitems.description: The name of this nodes. Should be unique, but no control is done.
classitems.name: name

classitems.description:
Indicate whether this node is selected or not.
Use CGSGScene::scenegraph.selectNode(nodeToSelect) to select a node
classitems.name: isSelected

classitems.description: The type of this class. Must be redefined by inherited classes
classitems.name: classType

classitems.description:
The 8 handleboxes that will be the resize handles
the resize handles will be in this order:
 0  1  2
 3     4
 5  6  7
classitems.name: resizeHandles

classitems.description: Level of transparency of the node.
classitems.name: globalAlpha

classitems.description: Indicate if the node is visible (and so selectable) or not
classitems.name: isVisible

classitems.description: If true, the node will be proportionally resized
classitems.name: isProportionalResize

classitems.description:
Define the method the detection (or "pick") method will be used for this node. Possible values CGSGPickNodeMethod.REGION and CGSGPickNodeMethod.GHOST.
  • REGION : the detection returns true if the mouse cursor is inside the bounding box of the node
  • GHOST : the detection will use the "renderGhost" method of the node to achieve a more accurate detection
classitems.name: pickNodeMethod

classitems.description: List of the children (empty if this nodes is a leaf)
classitems.name: children

classitems.description: The constraint region when moving the node
classitems.name: regionConstraint

classitems.description:
Pivot point to apply a rotation.
The point is a value between [0, 0] and [1, 1].
[0, 0] is the top left corner of the bounding box and [1, 1] the bottom right corner.
classitems.name: rotationCenter

classitems.description: can be fulfilled by the developer to put in whatever he needs
classitems.name: userdata

classitems.description:
selection attributes
If true, this node is clickable and so will be checked by the pickNode function
classitems.name: isClickable

classitems.description: If true, this node can be resized by the user. In that case, the dimension property will be affected, not the scale one.
classitems.name: isResizable

classitems.description: If true, the node can be dragged by the user
classitems.name: isDraggable

classitems.description: Color for the line around this node when selected
classitems.name: selectionLineColor

classitems.description: Width for the line around this node when selected
classitems.name: selectionLineWidth

classitems.description: Color for the handle boxes around this node when selected
classitems.name: selectionHandleSize

classitems.description: Color for the handle boxes around this node when selected
classitems.name: selectionHandleColor

classitems.description:
Updated by the scene itself. Don't update it manually.
True if the mice is over the node, false otherwise
classitems.name: isMouseOver

classitems.description:
Updated by the scene itself. Don't update it manually.
True if the node is being moved manually, false otherwise
classitems.name: isMoving

classitems.description:
Updated by the scene itself. Don't update it manually.
True if the node is being resized manually, false otherwise
classitems.name: isResizing

classitems.description: ID for the node. Should be filled by the developer. The framework will never use it.
classitems.name: _id

classitems.description: parent of this node
classitems.name: _parentNode

classitems.description:
Relative position of this nodes on the canvas container, relatively to the position of its parent node.
Never use it to move the node, use translateBy/translateWith/translateTo instead
classitems.name: position

classitems.description:
Absolute position of this nodes on the canvas container. Generated value. Don't modify it manually
Never use it to move the node, use translateBy/translateWith/translateTo instead
classitems.name: _absolutePosition

classitems.description:
Dimension of this nodes on the canvas container
Never use it to resize the node, use resizeBy/resizeWith/resizeTo instead
classitems.name: dimension

classitems.description:
Relative scale of this nodes on the canvas container, relatively to the scale of its parent node.
Never use it to scale or resize the node, use scaleBy/scaleWith/scaleTo instead
classitems.name: scale

classitems.description:
Absolute scale of this nodes on the canvas container. Generated value. Don't modify it manually
Never use it to scale the node, use scaleBy/scaleWith/scaleTo instead
classitems.name: _absoluteScale

classitems.description:
Relative rotation of this nodes on the canvas container, relatively to the rotation of its parent node.
Never use it to rotate or resize the node, use rotateBy/rotateWith/rotateTo instead
classitems.name: rotation

classitems.description:
Absolute rotation of this nodes on the canvas container. Generated value. Don't modify it manually
Never use it to rotate or resize the node, use rotateBy/rotateWith/rotateTo instead
classitems.name: _absoluteRotation

classitems.description: true if this node is traversable (recursively) (ie : by the picknode, a traverser, ...)
classitems.name: isTraversable

classitems.description: Callback on mouse over
classitems.name: onMouseOver

classitems.description: Callback on mouse out
classitems.name: onMouseOut

classitems.description: Callback on mouse up
classitems.name: onMouseUp

classitems.description: Callback on mouse or touch click
classitems.name: onClick

params.name: context

classitems.description:
Empty ghost rendering function.
Render here your custom nodes with a single color (cgsgGhostColor).
This will be used by the SceneGraph to know if the mouse cursor is over this nodes.
classitems.name: renderGhost

params.name: ghostContext
params.description: The context for the ghost rendering

classitems.description: Render the selection box and handle boxes around the bounding box of this node when selected

params.name: context
params.description: the context into render the node

params.name: context
params.description: the context into render the nodes

params.name: context
params.description: the context into render the nodes

classitems.name: beforeRenderGhost

params.name: context
params.description: the context into render the nodes

classitems.name: afterRenderGhost

params.name: context
params.description: the context into render the nodes

classitems.description: Mark this nodes as selected
classitems.name: setSelected

classitems.description:
return this if this nodes is under the mice cursor
Can be overrided by inherited klass to optimize this perform.
This default function used the ghost rendering method
classitems.name: detectSelection

classitems.description: Check if this nodes is under the cursor position.
classitems.name: pickNode

params.name: mousePosition
params.description: position of the mouse on the canvas

params.name: absoluteScale
params.description: a CGSGScale absolute relativeScale of all parents

params.name: ghostContext
params.description: a copy of the canvas context

params.name: recursively
params.description: if false, don't traverse the children of this nodes

params.name: condition
params.description:
Condition to be picked
ie: "color=='yellow'" or "classType=='CGSGNodeImage' && this.globalAlpha>0.5"

classitems.description: Return true if this nodes has no child
classitems.name: isALeaf

classitems.description: Replace current relative position by this new one

classitems.description: Add new coordinate to the current relative one

classitems.description: Replace current dimension by these new ones

classitems.description: Multiply current dimension by these new ones
classitems.name: resizeTBy

classitems.description: Increase/decrease current dimension with adding values
classitems.name: resizeWith

classitems.description: Replace current relative relativeScale by this new one
classitems.name: scaleTo

classitems.description: Multiply this relativeScale factor by the current relative relativeScale
classitems.name: scaleBy

classitems.description: Add to the current relative Scale
classitems.name: scaleWith

classitems.description: Replace current relative relativeRotation by this new oneScale
classitems.name: rotateTo

classitems.description: Multiply this relativeScale factor by the current relative relativeScale
classitems.name: rotateBy

classitems.description: Add this angle to the current relative relativeRotation

classitems.description: Add a new nodes into this one, at the end of the list
classitems.name: addChild

params.name: newNode
params.description: the nodes to add as a child

classitems.description:
Add a new nodes at a particular index in the list of children.
If the index is too large, the nodes will be inserted at the end of the list
classitems.name: addChildAt

params.name: newNode
params.description: the nodes to insert as a child

params.name: index
params.description: the position of the new child in the list

classitems.description: Remove the child passed in parameter and delete it
classitems.name: removeChild

params.name: recursively
params.description: if true, search the nodes on all the tree from this nodes

return.description: true if the child was correctly removed or false if the nodes was not found.

classitems.description: remove all children, delete them and reset the current parameters
classitems.name: removeAll

classitems.description: Detach the nodes in index 'index' without delete it. So it's not a child anymore
classitems.name: detachChildAt

classitems.description: Detach the nodes without delete it. So it's not a child anymore
classitems.name: detachChild

classitems.description:
Execute/Eval the script passed in parameter in "this" scope.
Used to set new value to an attribute of a node
classitems.name: evalSet

params.name: value
params.description: The new value for the attribute

example: node.evalSet("position.y", 12);

classitems.description: Set the region inside which one this node ca be placed an can move
classitems.name: setRegionConstraint

params.name: region
params.description: a CGSGRegion relatively to this parent region. Can be null.

return.description: the absolute positions of this node
the absolute scale of this node
the absolute rotation of this node

classitems.description: Compute the absolute position, rotation and scale in the canvas container
classitems.name: computeAbsoluteMatrix

return.description: true if the 2 nodes are colliding. They are colliding if the distance between them is minus than the threshold parameter

params.name: threshold
params.description: space between the 2 nodes before considering they are colliding

return.description: a Array of nodes this one is colliding with (can be empty)

params.name: threshold
params.description: space between the 2 nodes before considering they are colliding

params.name: threshold
params.description: space between the 2 nodes before considering they are colliding

return.description: true if this node is colliding one of the other children of its parent node

A line height is the size between 2 tops of line

Metrics of the text.

Use getWidth() and getHeight() methods to get correct values

Return a clone of this array.
All references will be passed as is. So a change on an object of the cloned array will also visible on this one.

classitems.description:
Set the new value for the display ratio.
The display ratio is used to resize all the elements on the graph to be adapted to the screen,
depending on the reference screen size.
You can compute the ratio like this: x = canvas.width/reference.width ; y = canvas.height/reference.height
classitems.name: setDisplayRatio

return.description: the current display ratio

Change the dimension of the canvas.
Does not really change the dimension of the rendering canvas container,
 but is used for different computations

classitems.description:
Mark the nodes as selected so the select marker (also called selectedHandlers)
 will be shown and the SceneGraph will manage the moving and resizing of the selected objects.
classitems.name: selectNode

classitems.description: Mark the nodes as not selected
classitems.name: deselectNode

classitems.description: Mark all nodes as not selected

classitems.description: Recursively traverse the nodes and return the one who is under the mouse coordinates
classitems.name: pickNode
example:
this.scenegraph.picknode(mousePosition, 'position.x > 100');
this.scenegraph.picknode(mousePosition, 'position.x > 100 && this.position.y > 100');

classitems.description: Remove the child nodes passed in parameter, from the root nodes
classitems.name: removeNode

params.name: recursively
params.description: if true, try to remove the nodes inside the entire tree

return.description: true if the nodes was found and removed

classitems.description:
Add a nodes on the scene.
If the root does not already exist, this nodes will be used as root
classitems.name: addNode

params.name: parent
params.description: the parent nodes of the new one. If it's null, the root will be used as nodes.

classitems.description: Add a key
classitems.name: addAnimationKey

params.name: node
params.description: handler to the nodes to animate

params.name: attribute
params.description: String representing the attribute to animate ("position.y", "rotation.angle", "fill", ...)

params.name: value
params.description: value for the attribute at the frame

params.name: method
params.description: animation method. Must be 'linear' for now

params.name: precompute
params.description: Set to true if you want to precompute the animations steps

example: this.sceneGraph.addAnimation(imgNode, "position.x", 2000, 200, "linear", true);

classitems.description: Animate an attribute of a nodes
classitems.name: animate

params.name: node
params.description: Handler to the nodes to animate

params.name: attribute
params.description: String representing the attribute to animate ("position.y", "rotation.angle", "fill", ...)

params.name: duration
params.description: Duration of the animation, in frame

params.name: method
params.description: Animation method. Must be 'linear' for now

params.name: delay
params.description: Delay before start the animation, in frames

params.name: precompute
params.description: Set to true if you want to precompute the animations steps

example: this.sceneGraph.animate(imgNode, "position.x", 700, 0, 200, "linear", 0, true);

return.description: true if there are still animation key after the current frame
